Content: The 68th Bellanwila Esala Perahera is scheduled to be held on the 11th of this month. Views in this respect were expressed by Chief Incumbent of the Bellanwila Raja Maha Vihare the Ven. Bellanwila Dhammarathana Thera at a media briefing held at the Government Information Department today. The Ven. Bellanwila Dhammarathana Thera said that the Randoli Perahera will parade the streets on the 11th of this month. They are getting ready to hold it on a grand scale. The Perahera is slated to parade the streets by 8.30 pm. He said he expected the support of the people who will be arriving to view the Perahera. There will be more than thirty elephants. The Nedumgamuwe tusker will be carrying the relicâ€™s casket. There will be more than 50 dancing troupes. He referred to the massive task rendered by the Late Ven. Bellanwila Wimalarathana Thera in conducting the Perahera festival. The prelate added that they are determined to hold the Perahera on a successful note as a mark of respect for him.
